instruction: Give some techniques to help with decision-making.
output: There are several techniques to help with decision-making. First, it can be helpful to gather as much information as possible before making a decision. Secondly, it can be beneficial to make a pro vs con list and look at the pros and cons of the decision. Thirdly, it can be helpful to work through scenarios and consider different scenarios and their outcome. Finally, it can be beneficial to seek out the opinions of others and get their feedback on the decision.
